name: Cursed One (itch) (randomJammer)
description:
Use the cards on your hand to move and attack monster and proceed to the door.

Every turn the character would be cursed by reducing one of his stats to one, either his HP, magic, energy or possible cards in hand.

Use mouse to select cards, then click red tiles to execute actions.  Cards need energy or magic to work, Click "Next turn" to continue.

Didn't have much time to actually polish it well enough for the jam, but I think it's interesting enough to submitted. It has some bugs and some things are not working but I think is playable.

Feel free to leave any comment.
